Prerequisite(s): Two Surging Shark maneuvers
Range: Personal
Target: You
Duration: Instantaneous

Description

Your skin grows rough and thick, impervious to the feeble attacks of your prey. You may initiate this counter when you are struck with a weapon. Make a Swim check against the attack roll. If successful, you take no damage. Instead, the damage you would have taken is rebounded to the weapon, potentially breaking it. If you were struck by a natural weapon or unarmed strike, the damage is instead inflicted upon the creature that struck you.
